lib/hope/tuple/print_tuple.h File Reference

Implementation of helper print functions. This functions might be used to print any instance of the aggregate type to the output stream; File contains a quit heavy include : iostream and should never be included at the header. Be careful with usages of these operators. More...

#include "hope/tuple/flat_tuple.h"
#include "hope/tuple/tuple_from_struct.h"
#include <iostream>

Detailed Description

Implementation of helper print functions. This functions might be used to print any instance of the aggregate type to the output stream; File contains a quit heavy include : iostream and should never be included at the header. Be careful with usages of these operators.
